name: Alpha
description:
A Full Stack Web Developer specializing in the MERN stack with a strong command of JavaScript and modern web technologies.

I thrive on building scalable and high-performance web applications, leveraging technologies like ReactJS, NextJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB. With experience in TypeScript, Redis, PostgreSQL, and Docker, I focus on crafting efficient, secure, and user-friendly solutions.

From developing real-time applications with Socket.IO to managing databases and cloud services like Firebase, I enjoy tackling challenges that push my technical skills further.
